description: The idea behind the app is useful. but needs improvements in memory optimization and search logic. I want to show growing this app.
fnggnngngngngng

Multi-page scanning doesn't work. Scans one sheet from the feeder then shoots the rest through without scanning them (even if I select number of pages to be scanned that is > 1). I have yet to find a scanner program compatible with Kubuntu that doesn't have the same problem. No idea if the other parts of the software work, because I only wanted to be able to scan documents from a scanner.
Looks nice, sees scanner(with Fuji1300i), and scans. Offers 4 rotations (one side only) but not selectable. Ubuntu 20.04LTS
Great to look into bank account reports, or work with a large collection of work related pdf files.

After scanning page, the page explodes into four variants with four orientations, i have no idea why, and "processing"...  During that i cant select anything or do anything more. Too early to be in ubuntu software repo, i think.

As more and more manuals and documentation move to digital, Paperwork makes it easy to organize your life. Backend opperates like a linux user wants with a simple folder backend. Makes it easy to move and sync.
It is full of bugs. It does not even work for anything. waste of time

description:
Everytime i start ocr it shuts down..
I do like the style... it just isnt working yet
Thanks

Once you get your head around the way it works this is a nice piece of software for easy saving/accessing of documents. When it works it works well, there are a couple of flaky issues, seemingly around ocr but I can work around them or forgive them. Paperwork is fairly simple to use but dont let that make you think it is simplistic in what it does.

This software is a really good idea but sadly when I tried it out, it didn't worked at all. Showed me my directories as the documents but every document inside the directories was not recognized. No scanner found either.
Best Software to import organize and manage documents
It fails at the basic functionality of importing existing files or scanning new ones.

Die hier angebotene Version von Paperwork wird nicht mehr unterstützt und startet auch nicht mehr unter ubuntu. Wenn man über Flatpak installiert läuft alles wie gewohnt. Gutes einfaches Programm, was alles tut, was man braucht.
